Package net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.digest

Interface FileDigester

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFileDigester, CksumFileDigester, CRC32FileDigester, MessageDigestFileDigester
public interface FileDigester
Class for computing checksums digests from files.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Julien Nicoulaud

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static int STREAMING_BUFFER_SIZE
    The size of the buffer used to stream the files contents while calculating their hashcode.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    String calculate​(File file)
    Calculate a checksum for a file.
    String getAlgorithm()
    Get the algorithm used to compute checksum digests.
    String getFileExtension()
    The filename extension for this digester.

  • Field Details

    • STREAMING_BUFFER_SIZE

      static final int STREAMING_BUFFER_SIZE
      The size of the buffer used to stream the files contents while calculating their hashcode.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getAlgorithm

      String getAlgorithm()
      Get the algorithm used to compute checksum digests.
      Returns:
      the algorithm.

    • getFileExtension

      String getFileExtension()
      The filename extension for this digester.
      Returns:
      the filename extension.

    • calculate

      String calculate​(File file) throws DigesterException, NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Calculate a checksum for a file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file to compute the checksum for.
      Returns:
      the current checksum.
      Throws:
      DigesterException - if there was a problem computing the hashcode.
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - in case the given is not supported.
